member.name: T:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig
member.summary: FocusGuide 配置类

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.Steps
member.summary: Array of steps to highlight.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.Animate
member.summary: Whether to animate the product tour. (default: true)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.OverlayColor
member.summary: Overlay color. (default: black)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.SmoothScroll
member.summary: Whether to smooth scroll to the highlighted element. (default: false)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.AllowClose
member.summary: Whether to allow closing the popover by clicking on the backdrop. (default: true)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.OverlayOpacity
member.summary: Opacity of the backdrop. (default: 0.5)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.StagePadding
member.summary: Distance between the highlighted element and the cutout. (default: 10)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.StageRadius
member.summary: Radius of the cutout around the highlighted element. (default: 5)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.AllowKeyboardControl
member.summary: Whether to allow keyboard navigation. (default: true)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.DisableActiveInteraction
member.summary: Whether to disable interaction with the highlighted element. (default: false)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.PopoverClass
member.summary: If you want to add custom class to the popover

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.PopoverOffset
member.summary: Distance between the popover and the highlighted element. (default: 10)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.ShowButtons
member.summary: Array of buttons to show in the popover. Defaults to ["next", "previous", "close"]

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.DisableButtons
member.summary: Array of buttons to disable.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.ShowProgress
member.summary: Whether to show the progress text in popover. (default: false)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.ProgressText
member.summary: Template for the progress text. You can use the following placeholders in the template: - {{current}}: The current step number - {{total}}: Total number of steps

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.NextBtnText
member.summary: Text to show in the next buttons.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.PrevBtnText
member.summary: Text to show in the prev buttons.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.DoneBtnText
member.summary: Text to show in the done buttons.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.OnDestroyStartedAsync
member.summary: 获得/设置 组件销毁前回调方法名称

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsConfig.OnDestroyedAsync
member.summary: 获得/设置 组件销毁前回调方法名称

member.summary: FocusGuide Popover 配置类

member.summary: Title shown in the popover.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsPopover.Description
member.summary: Descriptions shown in the popover.

member.summary: The position of the popover. "top" | "right" | "bottom" | "left"

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsPopover.Align
member.summary: The alignment of the popover. "start" | "center" | "end"

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsPopover.ShowButtons
member.summary: Array of buttons to show in the popover. "next" | "previous" | "close"

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsPopover.DisableButtons
member.summary: An array of buttons to disable. "next" | "previous" | "close"

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsPopover.NextBtnText
member.summary: Text to show in the next buttons.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsPopover.PrevBtnText
member.summary: Text to show in the prev buttons.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsPopover.DoneBtnText
member.summary: Text to show in the done buttons.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsPopover.ShowProgress
member.summary: Whether to show the progress text in popover. (default true)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.DriverJsPopover.ProgressText
member.summary: Template for the progress text. Defaults "{{current}} of {{total}}"

member.summary: Custom class to add to the popover element.
